definitions.definition: A communication, or what is communicated; any concept or information conveyed.
definitions.example: We've just received an urgent message from the President.

definitions.definition: An underlying theme or conclusion to be drawn from something.
definitions.example: The main message of the novel is that time heals all wounds.

definitions.definition: To send a message to; to transmit a message to, e.g. as text via a cell phone.
definitions.example: I messaged her about the concert.

definitions.definition: To send (something) as a message; usually refers to electronic messaging.
definitions.example: Please message the final report by fax.

definitions.definition: To send a message or messages; to be capable of sending messages.
definitions.example: The runaway computer program was messaging non-stop.
